control.name: ceMerging
control.description: Specifies whether cell merging is enabled.

control.name: simpleButton1
control.description: The ShowRibbonPrintPreview method shows a print preview of the data displayed by the Grid Control's DefaultView (the MainView or the currently maximized detail View). The opened print preview window is built using a Ribbon UI. To display the Print Preview window with a Bars UI, use the GridControl.ShowPrintPreview method instead.
